summary:
=== Purchase Information === Product Title: Purple Shampoo and Conditioner Set - No, Orange, Yellow or Brassy Tones - Best Toner Treatment for Brassiness - Blonde, Grey, Bleached or Silver Hair - Sulfate Free Review Date: 2021/05/26 Store: PURE NATURE LUX SPA Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Product Benefits': 'Nourishing,Clean,Gentle', 'Material Type Free': 'Sulfate Free', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'Hair Type': 'Color', 'Package Dimensions': '7.68 x 6.06 x 3.19 inches; 2.68 Pounds', 'Item model number': 'PURE NATURE LUX SPA', 'UPC': '765066671143'} Review Text: If I could I would give this minus stars. It's horrible. The shampoo does not lather and the conditioner does not condition. It does not smell good and it left my hair feeling like straw. Very dry straw. I do not recommend this. You will be sorry.
To be fair though this does cut down on that brassy or yellowish look.
I hate giving bad reviews but this product is no good. Review Title: Horrid Rating: 2.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Hair Curlers Spiral Curls Large Hair Rollers Wavy Hair Curler - Self Grip and No Heat Hair Styling Kit for Most Kinds Of Hairstyles With 2 Magic Wands (28 Pcs, 30cm) Review Date: 2021/06/05 Store: RIPPLE Average Rating: 3.5 Product Details: {'Hair Type': 'Wavy', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Size': '28 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Brand': 'RIPPLE', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Package Dimensions': '9.09 x 6.93 x 3.31 inches; 7.37 Ounces'} Review Text: These were easy to use after watching a YouTube video explaining how to use them. I had no idea until I watched that. They were so easy though. I washed my hair and let it get almost dry then used these. I have long hair and was afraid doing the end parts would leave the upper part of my hair frizzy but it didn't. They worked great. Next time I will leave them on overnight too. I have soft and bouncy hair and these made my very curly underneath part lay much better. No more. using heat on my hair.
It would have got 5 stars had it come with just a picture showing how to use these. Also I am wondering how to get the wand back apart to store it.
I very highly recommend this product. Review Title: So neat Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: ikoo Deep Caring Hair Mask, Hydrate & Shine, Great for Normal, Dry or Lackluster Hair, All Natural Ingredients, Effectively Hydrates, Moisturizes & Adds Shine - 6.8 Fl Oz Review Date: 2021/07/09 Store: ikoo Average Rating: 4.0 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Ikoo', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural, Cruelty Free, Vegan', 'Hair Type': 'Dry,Normal', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '3.74 x 3.74 x 3.15 inches; 11.68 Ounces'} Review Text: Not only is this product worthless, it stinks. I hated the smell. I can't tell if it is onion or garlic or a combo of the two. It didn't work out my tangles at all and I left it on a bit more than ten minutes.
I do not recommend this product. Save your money.
I received this as a Vine Reviewer and this is my honest opinion. Review Title: Smells nice Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Veencys - Hair Straightening Treatment - Brazilian Keratin - Chocolate Treatment -Maximum Strength-Ideal for Moisturizing Eliminates Frizzy Hairs Smooth Hair 32oz (946 ml) Review Date: 2021/07/25 Store: Veencys Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Package Dimensions': '9.84 x 3.15 x 3.11 inches; 2.34 Pounds'} Review Text: First listed ingredient is aqua formaldehyde. What’s up with that. I will not use this until it’s explained to me. That is a bit scary.
Don’t buy this product until that is rectified. It’s dangerous. You can google the effects of the formaldehyde and see for yourself.
In the picture, above the green line are the ingredients. The first one is formaldehyde. Review Title: Scary Rating: 1.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Blackhead Remover Pore Vacuum- Inface Blackhead Remover Suctioner, USB Electric Acne Comedone Whitehead Extractor Tool with 4 Different Type Replaceable Probes Review Date: 2021/08/07 Store: INFACE Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Brand': 'INFACE', 'Item Form': 'Pen', 'Material': 'Acrylonitrile Butadiene Styrene', 'Color': 'Pearl White', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Package Dimensions': '8.1 x 4 x 2 inches; 11.99 Ounces', 'Item model number': '01', 'UPC': '767136985860', 'Manufacturer': 'inFace', 'Country of Origin': 'China'} Review Text: I have some blackheads on my nose and whiteheads on my chin and this helps get them out. I think with continued use it will keep them under control. I do recommend you using it. Be sure and read the instructions first though. Review Title: I like this Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Ivnil hair removal spray pack of 2 Review Date: 2021/08/22 Store: Ivnil Average Rating: 3.8 Product Details: {'Item Form': 'Spray', 'Recommended Uses For Product': 'Anti-aging', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'Ivnil', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Package Dimensions': '2.76 x 2.32 x 2.28 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'UPC': '752771042412'} Review Text: This product makes my under eyes feel great. While I’m not noticing any less of the darkness under my eyes I do notice they don’t seem as dry.
It’s easy to use and does not have a scent that I can detect. It only takes a small amount under each eye. Blot it in and follow with an overall face moisturizer and your ready to go.
I like this product. Review Title: Like this Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Retinol Anti-aging Night Cream, Face Moisturizer for Anti-aging, Firming, Moisturizing With 3% Retinol, 2% Hyaluronic Acid, Polypeptides, Fullerenes, Vitamin C and E-American Brand Review Date: 2021/09/30 Store: GO MAY Average Rating: 4.1 Product Details: {'Brand': 'GO MAY', 'Scent': 'Fragrance free', 'Item Form': 'Cream', 'Active Ingredients': 'Retinol, Hyaluronic Acid, Polypeptides, Fullerenes, Vitamin C and Vitamin E', 'Unit Count': '1.0 Ounce', 'Product Dimensions': '2 x 2 x 3 inches; 6.74 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'GM-FC05', 'UPC': '734327009391', 'Manufacturer': 'Rixin'} Review Text: This product is very easy to use and does leave your face feeling soft once it absorbed in. I like the way the container is made. You get enough to cover your face with two pushes. I like using it at night when your face is more acceptable to moisturizers. It is kind of pricy but it’s also pretty good. Review Title: Ok Rating: 4.0 -------------------------------------------------- === Purchase Information === Product Title: Premium Taza Natural Moroccan Argan Oil Peppermint & Tea Tree Conditioner, 16 fl oz (473 ml) ♦ For Healthy, Smooth, Silky Hair ♦ Contains: Moroccan Argan Oil, Broccoli Seed Oil, Pro Vitamin B5, Hydrol Review Date: 2022/02/27 Store: Taza Average Rating: 3.4 Product Details: {'Brand': 'Taza', 'Item Form': 'Liquid', 'Material Feature': 'Natural', 'Hair Type': 'Frizzy', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '2.48 x 2.48 x 8.27 inches; 1.06 Pounds', 'UPC': '628451263623'} Review Text: This is just ok for me. It gets out tangles but that is about all. It left my hair soft but did nothing for frizz.
It's decently priced and the scent is great. Review Title: Just ok Rating: 3.0 --------------------------------------------------

prompt:
Based on the provided purchase history, generate three separate summaries focusing on different aspects of the user's experiences. Each summary should be under 256 words. Focus only on keywords and clear trends supported by multiple interactions. Do not repeat specific product names or details. avoid repeating product names, specifications, or technical details: 1. POSITIVE: Describe only the positive experiences and what was liked. 2. NEGATIVE: Describe only the negative experiences and what was disliked. 3. OVERALL: Provide a overall summary including both positive and negative aspects. Review Title: Just ok Rating: 3.0 -------------------------------------------------- Format your response exactly as follows: POSITIVE SUMMARY: [Your positive summary here] NEGATIVE SUMMARY: [Your negative summary here] OVERALL SUMMARY: [Your overall summary here]
raw_response:
POSITIVE SUMMARY:
The user has had several positive experiences with various hair products, noting ease of use and favorable outcomes. Specific interactions reflect satisfaction with results such as achieving soft, bouncy hair and nourishing effects that enhance hair health. Products were appreciated for their gentle formulations and effectiveness in addressing specific hair concerns, such as tangles and manageability. The user particularly enjoyed the simplicity of application methods, contributing to an overall positive hair care routine.

NEGATIVE SUMMARY:
Conversely, the user encountered multiple disappointing experiences with hair care products that failed to meet expectations. Common complaints included unpleasant smells and ineffectiveness, particularly regarding conditioning and detangling outcomes. Specific products were criticized for leaving hair feeling dry or straw-like. Concerns were raised over potentially harmful ingredients, prompting a reluctance to use certain treatments. The user expressed frustration over these negative attributes, indicating a clear trend of dissatisfaction in these product interactions.

OVERALL SUMMARY:
In summary, the user's shopping behavior showcases a mix of positive and negative experiences with hair care products. While some items provided beneficial results, contributing to softer and more manageable hair, others fell short, leading to feelings of disappointment due to poor performance and undesirable qualities. Despite enjoying the benefits of certain products, concerns regarding others, particularly around effectiveness and ingredient safety, highlight the user’s focus on quality and performance in their hair care routine.

target_interaction.title: Fair
target_interaction.text:
These are way cute. The problem is that some of them just didn’t work. The couple that did though held my hair great. Whether in a full pony or just pulling part of my hair back out of my face. Some would not stay closed though and just fell. The colors are pretty. And they are pretty easy to use once you get the hang of it.
Nice product for the ones that worked.
